item.title: (Planned Project) Briggs Personality Predictor
item.description: This is a project I’m planning on tackling as the summer goes on Feel free to checkout the Github and follow along with my progress Link to Github Repository

item.title: SnakeAI
item.description: This project is still a work in progress I have created the game of snake using Python and the pygame library I begin implementing the A* algorithm to find the shortest path to the next snack after each snack is eaten I plan to being working on a neural network to learn to play the game automatically Link to Github Repository

item.title: Database Systems Final Project
item.description: Collaborated with two other students to create a library application Front end is written in C# and the database is SQL Allows users to check in, check out, and put items on hold Link to Github Repository

item.title: Object Oriented Programming Final Project
item.description: Wrote this project in C# using Object Oriented techniques to create classes and other data structures Wrote unit tests to test every part of backend code Wrote both a front-end application and web-page using Razor Pages Link to Github Repository
